import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { forkJoin } from 'rxjs'; import { FutApiService } from 'src/app/service/fut-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.scss'], }) export class DetailsComponent implements OnInit { private urlCard: string = 'http://localhost:3000/card'; public card: any; constructor( private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute, private futApiService: FutApiService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.params.subscribe((params) => { const id = params['id']; this.futApiService.getCard(`${this.urlCard}/${id}`).subscribe((res) => { this.card = res; }); }); } } // get card(){ // const id = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.params['id']; // const card = this.futApiService.getCard(`${this.urlCard}/${id}`); // return card.subscribe( // res => { // console.log(res) // } // ); // }
